text.title: Literary Influence Network
text.more: Literature is intrinsically influx, taking on new values throughout time. While influential connections are a key factor in defining its characteristics, the influence network can supplement research. The network, curated solely using literary authors, also includes songwriters, philosophers and psychologists. While the color-based modularity partitions represent 19 communities of 3677 authors, the graph reinforces the prominence of influential ties within the literary world.
text.intro: The Network of Literary Authors queried authors' influenced/influenced by' DBpedia properties. Color-coded modularity partitions represent 19 communities within 3677 authors.</br>Andrea Hansen</br>Pratt School of Information
